Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance or sale of equity
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term capital lease obligations
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Capital Expenditures: capital expenditures incurred but not yet paid
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from hedge investing activities
payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from payments for securities purchased under agreements to resell
proceeds from repayments of notes payable
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire available for sale securities debt
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale of short term investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and other operating liabilities
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: discontinued operation gain loss on disposal of discontinued operation net of tax
foreign currency transaction gain loss unrealized
